name: obsidian-daily-manager
description: This is a package that lets you manage your Obsidian Daily Notes by adding recurring events, etc.

scripts.deployLocally: rollup --config rollup.config.js && mkdir obsidian-daily-manager && cp main.js obsidian-daily-manager && cp manifest.json obsidian-daily-manager && mkdir -p ../../../../My_Obsidian/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-daily-manager && rm -r ../../../../My_Obsidian/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-daily-manager && mv obsidian-daily-manager ../../../../My_Obsidian/.obsidian/plugins
